subject: Hockey, Ice
Stanley Cup
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Chris Pronger, who was chosen as the team’s most valuable player during the regular season, was plus-2 with two assists in Philadelphia’s 6-5 loss in Game 1 of the Stanley Cup finals.
snippet: Chris Pronger, who was chosen as the team’s most valuable player during the regular season, was plus-2 with two assists in Philadelphia’s 6-5 loss in Game 1 of the Stanley Cup finals.
